name: My Extension
description: This extension is a starting point to create a real Chrome extension

_execute_browser_action.description: Pin or unpin the current tab.

runner_pin_unpin_tab.description: Pin or unpin the current tab.

runner_pin_all_tabs.description: Pin all tabs in the current window.

runner_unpin_all_tabs.description: Unpin all pinned tabs in the current window.

runner_close_all_unpinned_tabs.description: Pin or unpin the current tab.
